title: Bug 117981 - Unable to Select Items Initially in Library Outline View
description: Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in the library outline view. Steps to reproduce: 1.
OB: When attempting to select any item for the first time in the library outline view, the focus jumps to the library file node instead of selecting the intended item.
EB: Upon the second attempt to select the label item, it should be successfully selected without the focus jumping to the library file node.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Open the library outline view. 2. Attempt to select any item for the first time. Observe the focus jumping to the library file node. 3. Repeat the selection process for the same item. Notice that on the second attempt, the item can be successfully selected without any focus issues.
